information: SoleilFOOD is a family-run company with the main task of serving the gastronomy industry, especially oriental cuisine. We have specialised in particular delicacies and offer our customers first-class products of tahini (sesame paste), pulses and spices in our constantly growing range. We attach great importance to the highest-quality products, sufficient advice and reasonable calculation of prices. Thanks to the satisfaction of our customers and their recommendation, we have managed to gain more new customers in the fields of hummus and falafel production, sauces and dips, gastronomy and catering, wholesale and resellers. If you are looking for a reliable, experienced supplier of ingredients especially for the production of hummus and falafel, as well as spices and much more, then you have come to the right place and we look forward to welcoming you as a customer.
